title: How to Present Study Results
question_text:
In a study for a new pain medication designed to lower pain for migraine sufferers, a study of random patients was to be done and their decrease in pain was to be measured on a scale from $1$ to $10$ ($10$ is the highest pain possible).
The company wanted to publish results that would give the widest possible confidence interval width. Of course, these results would be dependent upon the patients' reporting, but which of the following would not increase the width of the confidence interval?
